Author: Mahatma Gandhi

Quote: “New thoughts and ideas will forever be a part of humanity’s developmental path.”
Author: Jay D'Cee

Quote: “Today’s society has an obsession with electronic entertainment.”
Author: Jay D'Cee

Quote: “When wealth flees, untrue friends follow.”
Author: Thomas F. Shubnell

Quote: “Live like a tree, giving, forgiving and free.”
Author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

Quote: “If you’re smart, you care. And if you care, you love.”
Author: Lauren Oliver, Pandemonium

Quote: “Through memory we travel against time, through forgetfulness we follow its course.”
Author: Joseph Joubert, The Notebooks of Joseph Joubert

Quote: “Don't hesitate to give up the better to gain the best.”
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: “Without your effort, how can you attain any worthwhile achievement?”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “There are as many styles of beauty as there are visions of happiness.”
Author: Stendhal, Love

Quote: “Only you may show others where light comes from”
Author: Isaac Nash, AMERICA EXIST

Quote: “When God throws something your way, catch it!”
Author: Chriscinthia Blount

Quote: “When admiring other people's gardens, don't forget to tend to your own flowers.”
Author: Sanober Khan

Quote: “We must have the courage to overcome our own personal pitfalls.”

Quote: “Every angel is terrifying.”
Author: Rainer Maria Rilke, Duino Elegies

Quote: “You must first become the person who deserves it all”
Author: Saurabh Bhardwaj

Quote: “Always, time is our worst enemy, stealing away what is most precious to me.”
Author: Sarah K.L. Wilson, Dance With The Sword

Quote: “Of all the resources in our lives, time is undoubtedly the most precious.”

Quote: “Time doesn't stop or give warning. It simply ticks along, marking time, ignoring humanity.”
Author: Amy Harmon, From Sand and Ash

Quote: “Here we are, trapped in the amber of the moment. There is no why.”
Author: Kurt Vonnegut

Quote: “Nothing is impossible, Everything should be possible when we trying for achieve the goal”
Author: Sanjeev Murukan

Quote: “Helen likes Brussels sprouts. How can anyone trust her opinion?”
Author: Lisa Kleypas, Marrying Winterborne

Quote: “Someone's opinion of you does not have to become your reality.”
Author: Les Brown

Quote: “Everything that happens before Death is what counts.”
Author: Ray Bradbury, Something Wicked This Way Comes

Quote: “The journey of life looks differently for everyone.”
Author: Jay D'Cee

Quote: “Never stop believing that your dreams are eternal.”
Author: Truth Devour, Unrequited

Quote: “Happiness only real when shared.”
Author: Christopher McCandless

Quote: “Freedom is in the Now”
Author: Arnaud Saint-Paul, The Human Project

Quote: “How can you trust in something you don’t really know?”
Author: A.D. Aliwat, In Limbo

Quote: “There is no poetry where there are no mistakes.”
Author: Joy Harjo

Quote: “Sometimes success demands a certain refined insanity.”
Author: Isobelle Carmody, The Keeping Place

Quote: “If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.”
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: “It is true – you are worthy of all that you have.”
Author: Jay D'Cee

Quote: “There are only two ways of telling the complete truth--anonymously and posthumously.”
Author: Thomas Sowell

Quote: “Never submit we are all equals”
Author: Heather Nelson, The Albino Redwoods

Quote: “I know you're tired but come, this is the way.”
Author: Jalalu'l-din Rumi

Quote: “It is difficult to make the right choice if you fear choosing wrongly.”

Quote: “Never surrender to you're passions. Dream and live to excess.”

Quote: “Life is all a green old English garden and time an endless summer afternoon.”
Author: Henry James, A Passionate Pilgrim

Quote: “Mistakes happen, and we should not try so fervently to avoid then.”

Quote: “Don't be disappointed by failure, always remember it is a part of success.”

Quote: “You are", he says, "the absolute worst idea I've ever had.”
Author: Casey McQuiston, Red, White & Royal Blue

Quote: “A smiling lie is a whirlwind, easy to enter, but hard to escape.”
Author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

Quote: “Freedom is an absolute state, there is no such thing as being half-free.”
Author: Daniel Delgado F

Quote: “The elegance under pressure is the result of fearlessness.”

Quote: “Fifty percent of something is better than than one hundred percent of nothing.”
Author: Chuck Barris, You and Me, Babe

Quote: “Love your life. That's a direct route to something people used to call "happiness".”
Author: Clementine Holzinger, EL32

Quote: “Evolution is extremely good at filling every nook in the ecosystem”
Author: Andy Weir, Project Hail Mary

Quote: “The human spirit must prevail over technology.”
Author: Albert Einstein

Quote: “You are worthy of all that you have.”
Author: Jay D'Cee

Quote: “To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.”
Author: Oscar Wilde, An Ideal Husband

Quote: “A thing is not necessarily true because a man dies for it.”

Quote: “The journey of self-love is an ever-evolving process.”

Quote: “That kind of imagination is why we're not dead.”

Quote: “Never deprive yourself of the necessary time for recuperation and healing.”

Author: Gregory David Roberts, Shantaram

Quote: “You won't find the truth of life in morbidity, only in hope.”

Quote: “I would rather die an individual than live my life as a clone.”

Quote: “Everyone knew as much as they needed to know to be happy.”

Quote: “A poem is a meteor.”

Quote: “How far would you go to keep the hope of love alive?”

Quote: “Sometimes the truth feels good.”
Author: Carson Kressley

Quote: “Impact over income.”
Author: Rob Liano

Quote: “Society pushes us into patterns that deny us the chance for spontaneity.”

Quote: “Everyone remains a student of technology for life.”
Author: Sukant Ratnakar , Quantraz

Quote: “Your highest thoughts sometimes arise in your lowest moments.”

Quote: “Facts are the enemy of truth.”
Author: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra

Quote: “Time is a great teacher, but unfortunately it kills all its pupils ...”

Quote: “Eighty percent of success is just showing up.”
Author: Stephen King, Mr. Mercedes

Quote: “Whereever you end up;" Jack whispered into my ear."I wish you clear skies. Always”

Quote: “People's differences do not intimidate nor offend me.”

Quote: “Success is the key of complete determination.”
Author: pranita deshpande

Quote: “Everything changes except the love.”

Quote: “And to 'scape stormy days, I choose an everlasting night.”

Quote: “There are stars inside the universe nobody ever wrote about.”

Quote: “Never develop an ego after achieving success.”

Quote: “There would be a time, when you will ask for nothing but life.”

Quote: “You are like nobody since I love you.”
Author: pablo neruda

Quote: “Prediction is very difficult, especially about the future.”
Author: Niels Bohr

Quote: “The fact is…I’m in love with you, and I have been for some time.”
Author: Colleen Houck, Tiger's Curse

Quote: “Beware: open-mindedness will often say, 'Everything is permissible except a sharp opinion.”

Quote: “Your greatest path of influence is love.”

Quote: “Don’t just be a deliverer of yourself, but a deliverer of your whole nation”

Quote: “Life isn't fair. It's just fairer than death, that's all.”

Quote: “If you're not gonna tell the truth, then why start talking?”

Quote: “There is no person in this world who can exist without making mistakes.”

Quote: “Writing would be dull if we didn't incorporate our life experiences.”

Quote: “Even if happiness forgets you a little bit, never completely forget about it.”

Quote: “Living in the past makes your future predictable.”

Quote: “Dicen que no puedes enamorarte de las alas de alguien y luego pretender cortárselas.”

Quote: “You have to become the person who deserves what you desire.”

Quote: “The dead can survive as part of the lives of those that still live.”
Author: Kenzaburō Ōe, Hiroshima Notes

Quote: “You can be your own boss”

Quote: “Aku ingin bahagia. Dan, aku berhak bahagia--tanpamu.”

Quote: “All the friends in the world are in the fountain of a pen.”

Quote: “Life begins at the very moment of the Self-realization of God with higher consciousness.”

Quote: “The master key to your brighter future is you”

Quote: “To fear another human being is to sin against yourself.”

Quote: “Staying in the past won't help you move on to your future".”
Author: Princess Chezka B. Asaldo

Quote: “Remain engaged in active learning throughout your lifetime to ensure your mind remains sharp.”

Quote: “Her heart was a secret garden and the walls were very high.”
Author: William Goldman, The Princess Bride

Quote: “Commit to the present moment.”
Author: Jay D'Cee

Quote: “My life would be sour grapes and ashes without you”
Author: Daisy Ashford

Quote: “Keep an open mind, and you will land where you are meant to be.”
Author: Jay D'Cee

Quote: “I believe that truth has only one face: that of a violent contradiction.”
Author: Georges Bataille, Violent Silence: Celebrating Georges Bataille

Quote: “Science without conscience is the soul's perdition.”
Author: Francois Rabelais, Pantagruel

Quote: “When my vision becomes a reality, this world will live rest in peace alive”
Author: Anuj Jasani

Quote: “You are more powerful when you innerstand your emotional vantage point.”

Quote: “How the journey started is not necessarily a reflection of how it will end.”
Author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

Quote: “Deep down, everyone wants the truth.”

Quote: “There is love in holding and there is love in letting go.”
Author: Elizabeth Berg, The Year of Pleasures

Quote: “Never run from the enemy, tackle them”

Quote: “To work for God effectively, you have to expand and stretch yourself”

Quote: “Cynicism is the calling card of unhappy people.”

Quote: “The treacherous are ever distrustful.”
Author: J.R.R. Tolkien, The Two Towers

Quote: “Become braver, stronger, wiser, kinder, and you will become better.”
Author: Matshona Dhliwayo

Quote: “IT'S A SWORD, said the Hogfather. THEY'RE NOT /MEANT/ TO BE SAFE.”

Quote: “There's only one thing that can heal the heart... Only one... It's love, Gaara.”
Author: Masashi Kishimoto

Quote: “The power of love can spread magic to the world like nothing else.”
Author: Amy Leigh Mercree

Quote: “If you were mine, I'd never leave you, Prudence. I couldn't.”
Author: Anne Gracie, The Perfect Rake

Quote: “In the end, it wasn't death that surprised her but the stubbornness of life.”
Author: Jeffrey Eugenides, The Virgin Suicides

Quote: “Painful memories serve as a catalyst for growth.”
Author: Jay D'Cee

Quote: “Gradually, we have become each other's weather.”
Author: Paul Zweig, Eternity's Woods

Quote: “The path to self-discovery requires acutely familiarity with your thoughts and desires.”

Quote: “Your body wages biological warfare on me.”
Author: Helen Hoang, The Kiss Quotient

Quote: “Don’t act based on religion; always have a purpose and focus”
Author: Sunday Adelaja

Quote: “Do not look for happiness outside yourself. The awakened seek happiness inside.”
Author: Peter Deunov

Quote: “Out of this nettle - danger - we pluck this flower - safety.”
Author: William Shakespeare

Quote: “The truth is the kindest thing we can give folks in the end.”
Author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

Quote: “Jump inside a painting till you retouch your life with colors of euphoria.”
Author: Suyasha Subedi

Quote: “Time is how you spend your love.”
Author: Zadie Smith

Quote: “Poets are shameless with their experiences: they exploit them.”
Author: Friedrich Nietzsche

Quote: “Nature is never interpreted by numbers.”
Author: Lailah Gifty Akita

Quote: “The truth is not good or bad, it is just the truth.”
Author: J.B. Thomas, Little Moments Of Truth

Quote: “But you've slipped under my skin, invaded my blood and seized my heart.”
Author: Maria V. Snyder, Poison Study

Quote: “I am the only force strong enough to stop me.”
Author: Naya S. Wood

Quote: “You are a delinquent and a plague. Please come.”
Author: Casey McQuiston, Red, White & Royal Blue

Quote: “One's rebuke engraves itself upon the mind more than one's praise.”
Author: Seth D.

Quote: “Being an ignoramus is not enough to prevent one from being famous.”
Author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

Quote: “Never Give up, never surrender.”
Author: Nancy J. Cohen

Quote: “Risk is renamed as opportunity so people would be comfortable to take it.”
Author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

Quote: “It can be immensely taxing, both emotionally and physical, to harbor a grudge.”
Author: Jay D'Cee

Quote: “Believe me, when you die, it's everybody else's but your problem”
Author: Cecelia Ahern, The Gift

Quote: “The summer kings are gods, and we are finally, in the end, just men.”
Author: Alaya Dawn Johnson, The Summer Prince

Quote: “Fame and financial success cannot heal the wounds of heartbreak and trauma.”
Author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

Quote: “Those who get offended with my words, have problem with my silence too”
Author: Rehan Katrawale

Quote: “Marriage is a wonderful invention; but then again so is a bicycle repair kit.”
Author: Billy Connolly

Quote: “The same word we love and hate, leaves in different directions, taking different paths.”
Author: Dejan Stojanovic, The Sun Watches the Sun

Quote: “We’re young, we’re not monsters, no fools: we’ll conquer happiness for ourselves.”
Author: Ivan Turgenev

Quote: “The world is filled with love-play, from animal lust to sublime compassion.”
Author: Alan Watts

Quote: “Wouldn’t the joys of life lose all colour, if life was eternal?”
Author: Constantina Maud, Hydranos

Quote: “My dreams are nothing less than war”
Author: Anuj Jasani

Quote: “The back door of every tomb opens on a hilltop.”
Author: George MacDonald, Weighed and Wanting

Quote: “But time passes. Fear becomes a memory. Terror becomes routine; it loses its grip.”
Author: Bernard Beckett, Genesis

Quote: “Don't be afraid of failure. This is the way to succeed.”
Author: LeBron James, Shooting Stars

Quote: “Apa kamu tidak bisa menerima takdir kalau kita akan selalu pergi bersama?”
Author: Jenny Thalia Faurine, Unplanned Love

Quote: “Truth is the only safe ground to stand on.”
Author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

Quote: “that as long as we are being remembered, we remain alive.”
Author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

Quote: “It all starts with acknowledging a problem.”
Author: Jay D'Cee

Quote: “It's strange how time can make a place shrink, make its strangeness ordinary.”
Author: Veronica Roth, Allegiant

Quote: “You fall because you are human, and rise because you are divine.”
Author: Matshona Dhliwayo

Quote: “ One sometimes finds what one is not looking for ”
Author: Alexander Fleming

Quote: “You are never too old to learn new things.”
Author: Jay D'Cee

Quote: “Time is the best author. It always writes the perfect ending.”
Author: Charlie Chaplin

Quote: “Pain, unless it is physical, was sold to you (by your culture).”
Author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

Quote: “To love is to suffer and there can be no love otherwise.”
Author: Fyodor Dostoevsky, Notes from Underground

Quote: “Problems Equals Opportunities!”
Author: DrB!

Quote: “You are worthy of your friends and family.”
Author: Jay D'Cee

Quote: “Was this some new level of depravity? Had he developed a spinster fetish?”
Author: Lisa Kleypas, Married by Morning

Quote: “Having a strong mindset is the key of success.”
Author: Atalay Aydın

Quote: “Knowing the truth is not always a kindness.”
Author: Rosamund Hodge, Cruel Beauty

Quote: “Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do. ”
Author: John R Wooden

Quote: “true apothecary thy drugs art quick”
Author: William Shakespeare, Romeo and Juliet

Quote: “The words ‘I Love You’ kill, and resurrect millions, in less than a second.”
Author: Aberjhani, Elemental: The Power of Illuminated Love
